name: Golfing Genius
description:
This is my first time exporting a game with Godot so it's pretty messed up but I think you just have to download the .exe (Windows and Linux) and run it. I exported it as a .zip to, that includes the code and all of the assets if you want to run it in Godot for you self. I'm really sorry if it's complicated.

You have one shot at a golf ball and you need to hit the hole to score. If you miss you die.

Controls:

Press left mouse to shoot. I didn't have time to add a reset button nor sound but it's quite fun for a really small amount of time. But I at least had some fun making the game!

Notes:

I'm on Linux, it works there I haven't tried it on Windows but I think it will work fine.

I might update it some time in the future I don't know.
